metadata.name: Rundll32 UNC Path Execution
metadata.comment: Detects rundll32 execution where the DLL is located on a remote location (share)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \\\\')))

output.summary: Detects rundll32 execution where the DLL is located on a remote location (share)
